text: Marilyn Ann Chambers (April 22, 1952 â€“ April 12, 2009) was an American pornographic actress, exotic dancer and fashion model. She was born Marilyn Ann Briggs in Providence, Rhode Island. She was raised in Westport, Connecticut. She was notable for performing in many pornographic movies, including Behind the Green Door and mainstream movies, including Rabid. Chambers died in Santa Clarita, California due to cerebral hemorrhage and aneurysm cause by heart disease. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Actors from Rhode Island Category:American erotic dancers Category:American models Category:American movie actors Category:American pornographic actors Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage
title: Marilyn Chambers
